attributes.additional_details:
with out any sort of funding grassroots boxing could be finished 
We are not just boxing club but lifeline for kids to go to a safe environment 
Most youth clubs have been shut years ago boxing club provide a safe environment for young males and female to go guving them life skill keeping them out of gangs and crimes 
We need funding like the rest of sport as with out many gym will shut putting kids on the streets witch will result in crime rates going up Fact
attributes.background:
